Returns: Returns a new instance of the Parcelable class.
Parameters: Parcel: The Parcel to read the object's data from.
createFromParcel(android.os.Parcel).Description: Create a new instance of the Parcelable class, instantiating it from the given Parcel whose data had previously been written by @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@.
